nodes.bodyText: removed the a, it seems little weird.
I suggest to move most classes in this package to io.grpc.rls.internal.*, as #6711, it could be very difficult to do it later due to pending merge conflicts.
good point. thanks removed to internal.
nit: add /* server = */ to let linter check the arguments are passed in the right order
i believe this is no longer enforced.
These checks can move to the constructor. If you're not converting from json, e.g. convert from a proto or call the constructor directly in test, you don't have to write the checks again.
nit: Use /*  argName = */ to let linter check if the args are correctly ordered.
